name: Orient Flights Aviation Academy
about: Orient Flights Aviation Academy (OFAA), located in Mysore, is a renowned pilot training establishment approved by the Directorate General of Civil Aviation (DGCA), Government of India. Part of the Hindustan Group of Institutions, OFAA offers a range of courses including Commercial Pilot License (CPL), Private Pilot License (PPL), Cabin Crew Training, Ground Staff Training, and IATA Airline Customer Service. The academy is equipped with modern infrastructure, including a fleet of training aircraft such as Cessna 152, Cessna 172, and Piper Seneca IV. OFAA prioritizes safety and employs the latest technological methods in training. The academy also provides career placement services and has a strong track record of its alumni joining various airlines in India and abroad. With a commitment to quality education and safety, OFAA continues to be a leading institution in aviation training.
